select ct.challenge_id, ct.user_id, ct.challenge_name, ct.challenge_introduction, ct.is_applicable, ct.start_date, ct.end_date, ct.category_name, ut.name, ct.challenge_like_count, ct.challenge_layout, ct.challenger, ct.is_deadline, ct.is_hidden from challenge_tb ct left outer join user_tb ut on(ut.user_id = ct.user_id) where 1 = 1

and ct.category_name like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%")
order by

ct.challenge_id asc
ct.challenge_like_count desc
ct.challenger desc
ct.challenge_id desc

and ct.challenge_name like concat("%", #{searchValue}, "%")

select ct.challenge_id, ct.user_id, ct.challenge_name, ct.challenge_introduction, ct.is_applicable, ct.start_date, ct.end_date, ct.category_name, ut.name, ct.challenge_like_count, ct.challenge_layout from challenge_tb ct left outer join user_tb ut on(ut.user_id = ct.user_id)
select date_format(start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, count(*) as count from challenge_tb where is_deadline = 0 and is_hidden = 0 group by date_format(start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') order by date asc;
select date_format(end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, count(*) as count from challenge_tb where is_deadline = 1 group by date_format(end_date, '%Y-%m-%d')
select date_format(end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, count(*) as count from challenge_tb where is_hidden = 1 group by date_format(end_date, '%Y-%m-%d')
select count(distinct date(ft.datetime)) as count from challenge_tb ct left outer join feed_tb ft on(ft.challenge_id = ct.challenge_id) where ct.challenge_id = #{challengeId};
